surveyQuestions.surveyQuestion: Which technology platform introduced you to our survey service?
We collaborate with tech companies to provide earning opportunities through surveys. Your responses help advance their innovations, so please provide thoughtful answers.
Our platform allows you to earn money from tech-focused surveys. Payments are processed upon survey submission.
Some tech surveys require specific expertise. You may be disqualified from certain surveys based on your experience.
You will have access to one tech survey daily. Upgrade your account from your profile for more surveys. This survey is free, and you can take another one.
Once you accumulate enough earnings from tech surveys, you can request a withdrawal for processing.
Have friends interested in tech? Earn Ksh 30 for every tech survey your friend completes.
